title: Westward Sight
description: A clean historical western cowboy romance novel about a mail order bride.  Montana Mail Order Brides - Westward Series Book 22  When Frankie Scorrano and D.J. Samuels meet, romance blossoms, but when a terrible illness strikes, leaving behind complications, will their love survive or will it succumb to bitterness and despair?
author: Linda Bridey
